SELECT LAST_INSERT_ID()
insert into GROUP_FILE (GROUP_ID, FILE_NAME, FILE_ID, UPLOADER_ID, COMMENT) values (#{groupId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{fileName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{fileId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{uploaderId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{comment,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.select: select * from GROUP_FILE where GROUP_ID = #{param1,jdbcType=INTEGER} and STATE=#{param2,jdbcType=INTEGER};

select GROUP_ID groupId, GROUP_NAME groupName, GROUP_THEME groupTheme, GROUP_BUILDER_ID groupBuilderId, GROUP_LEADER_ID groupLeaderId, GROUP_DEPUTY1_ID groupDeputy1Id, GROUP_DEPUTY2_ID groupDeputy2Id, GROUP_DEPUTY3_ID groupDeputy3Id, TOTAL_VOLUME totalVolume, EXISTED_VOLUME existedVolume, GROUP_TIME_BUILD groupTimeBuild, COMMENT comment from GROUP_TABLE where GROUP_ID = #{groupId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.insert:
SELECT LAST_INSERT_ID()
insert into GROUP_FILE (GROUP_ID, FILE_NAME, FILE_ID, UPLOADER_ID, UPLOAD_TIME, STATE, DELETE_TIME, COMMENT) values (#{groupId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{fileName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{fileId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{uploaderId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{uploadTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{state,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{deleteTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{comment,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.update: update GROUP_FILE set GROUP_ID = #{groupId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, FILE_NAME = #{fileName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, FILE_ID = #{fileId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, UPLOADER_ID = #{uploaderId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, UPLOAD_TIME = #{uploadTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, STATE = #{state,jdbcType=INTEGER}, DELETE_TIME = #{deleteTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, COMMENT = #{comment,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where UPLOAD_ID = #{uploadId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select UPLOAD_ID, GROUP_ID, FILE_NAME, FILE_ID, UPLOADER_ID, UPLOAD_TIME, STATE, DELETE_TIME, COMMENT from GROUP_FILE where UPLOAD_ID = #{uploadId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
